wordGroup: on the battlefield 在战场上

sentences.en: The castle stands on the site of an ancient battlefield.
sentences.cn: 那座城堡坐落在一片古战场上。

sentences.en: I shall conceal myself at a safe distance from the battlefield.
sentences.cn: 我将把自己藏在一个远离战场的安全地带。

sentences.en: She disguised herself as a man so she could fight on the battlefield.
sentences.cn: 她女扮男装以便能上战场打仗。
